nodes.name: study
nodes.definition: A study is a project with the goal to investigate something.

nodes.name: author
nodes.definition: An author is an agent that creates or has created written work.

nodes.name: scenario
nodes.definition: A scenario is an information content entity that contains statements about a possible future development based on a coherent and internally consistent set of assumptions and their motivation.

nodes.name: analysis scope
nodes.definition: An analysis scope is an information content entity that describes the boundaries of what a study or scenario covers.
